entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
